House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00731
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7653, ENTITLED "THE NEW CENTRAL BANK ACT"
ABSTRACT : Seek to enhance the administration of the monetary credit and banking system of the Republic by among other things, affirming the authority of the Bangko Sentral to administer the payments and settlements systems; proposed that the authority of the examiners to access deposit accounts which was granted before and was exercised without abuse, be restored; BSP officials and personnel should be granted the same legal protection given to the PDIC under R.A. No. 9576.
